name: Office Simulator (violetrosees)
description: Office Simulator is a visual novel-style puzzle game. The player plays as Guy B. Manson, an office salesperson working overtime. It’s late in the evening, and the player must help Guy complete the shift. However, events go awry, and the player completes puzzles to progress the game. Guy experiences many spooky events, but he attempts to reason through them. After completing all tasks, expected and unexpected, the player is taken to Guy’s home for a spooky encounter.
